parameters.command: set -e; PROJECT_DIR=""; for d in "$N8N_PROJECT_DIR" "/workspaces/letomi-viral" "/root/letomi-viral" "/home/node/letomi-viral" "/opt/letomi-viral"; do if [ -n "$d" ] && [ -f "$d/package.json" ]; then PROJECT_DIR="$d"; break; fi; done; if [ -z "$PROJECT_DIR" ]; then echo "Project directory not found. Set N8N_PROJECT_DIR env var (example: /root/letomi-viral)."; exit 1; fi; cd "$PROJECT_DIR"; npm run publish:auto

set -e; PROJECT_DIR=""; for d in "$N8N_PROJECT_DIR" "/workspaces/letomi-viral" "/root/letomi-viral" "/home/node/letomi-viral" "/opt/letomi-viral"; do if [ -n "$d" ] && [ -f "$d/package.json" ]; then PROJECT_DIR="$d"; break; fi; done; if [ -z "$PROJECT_DIR" ]; then echo "Project directory not found. Set N8N_PROJECT_DIR env var (example: /root/letomi-viral)."; exit 1; fi; cd "$PROJECT_DIR"; npm run seo:check

set -e; PROJECT_DIR=""; for d in "$N8N_PROJECT_DIR" "/workspaces/letomi-viral" "/root/letomi-viral" "/home/node/letomi-viral" "/opt/letomi-viral"; do if [ -n "$d" ] && [ -f "$d/package.json" ]; then PROJECT_DIR="$d"; break; fi; done; if [ -z "$PROJECT_DIR" ]; then echo "Project directory not found. Set N8N_PROJECT_DIR env var (example: /root/letomi-viral)."; exit 1; fi; cd "$PROJECT_DIR"; npm run ping

parameters.jsCode: return [{ json: { status: 'success', message: 'CurioSpark pipeline finished successfully', timestamp: new Date().toISOString() } }];
